var data = [
  {text: "Black", value: "1"},
  {text: "Orange", value: "2"},
  {text: "Grey", value: "3"}
];
$(input).kendoDropDownList({
  dataTextField: "text",
  dataValueField: "value",
  dataSource: data,
  index: 0
});
$(select).kendoDropDownList();
